title: How does BookMyShow Stream work? Do I have to pay for the movies I want to watch? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body: The best part about BookMyShow Stream is you only pay for what you watch. You can buy or rent a movie of your choice in the resolution of your choice and watch it online on any platform or a device. You can also buy or rent a bundle of movies. All the bought/rented movies are available for streaming across multiple platforms, including your phone, laptop, desktop or TV.
